EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Top Data Science Trends for 2015_Q414.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Top Data Science Trends For 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Top Data Science Trends For 2015 on Tuesday, December 16, 2014. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, December 16, 2014 Time: 10AM PST/6PM GMT
Event Number: 661 862 287 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?d=661862287&t=a> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 661 862 287
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
